item.description: Skiing after work starting at 5:15 ish pm on Great Herring Pond (Exit 2 off Rt. 3 South in Plymouth) Share of Gas, etc should be $20.00 Please email me your mobile number if I do not already have it. I will have some skis for those who do not have their own. And bring your own if have them.  Bring water or snacks if you want to.. Glen's Mobile 617-799-1316
item.how_to_find_us: I will be here or call my mobile.
item.name: Great Herring Pond Plymouth, MA - Thursday after Work 5:15pm
